p: For GC-MS analysis, five grams of plant powder was defatted three times in 50 mL of n-hexane, and the extraction was performed by sonication in an ultrasound bath (130 kHz) for 45 min. After centrifugation for 5 min, the supernatant was filtered through a paper filter, dried with rotary evaporator, and reconstituted with n-hexane, prior to GC-MS analysis.
